actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code with respect to the computation of the ten year period in which wives and widows may pursue programs of education.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to compute the ten-year period in which wives and widows of veterans may pursue programs of education as beginning at the date of death of the spouse from whom eligibility is derived (such authority currently exists).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code with respect to the computation of the ten year period in which wives and widows may pursue programs of education.
